about_the_game:
Battle of Legendary Tanks

Get into the spirit World War II and plunge into realistic 3D tank online battles in the game Grand Tanks! Brave tankers, get ready for an interesting game where strategy and the power of combat vehicles decide everything.

A combination of genres

Grand Tanks is not just a tank game, it is a combination of such popular genres as action, shooter, arcade and strategy. Show your strategic abilities in exciting online battles where every shot can be decisive.

A large selection of equipment

Choose from over 25+ legendary tanks, where each tank is a story, each shell is a step towards victory. Upgrade your tanks, test different strategies and dominate in PvP mode.

Become a participant in the story

Grand Tanks was created for those who appreciate history, who want to become part of the World War II and who like free tank games. With each online battle, you write your page in the history of the great war, and powerful equipment is at your disposal. Use strategy to defeat your opponent faster.

Full Immersion in the Battle

Magnificent 3D graphics and impressive sound effects take you to the center of the battle, where explosions and gunshots are felt with incredible realism, this free game offers you to become its hero.

Fight, Win and Become a Legend

Your tanks are waiting for the commander to destroy the enemy on the battlefield. In the online battle mode, the battles become even more extensive.

A Team Game

Grand Tanks is a team game where your every move is of great importance. Create your own unique tank, participate in rating battles and strategic battles, show your military skills on the fields of the great Second World War.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS, Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

name: Grand Tanks: WW2 Tank Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The game combines the two best sides of gameplay: part from a serious tank simulator and part from exciting and fast arcade battles. Millions of players from all over the world are fighting on the best representatives of tank equipment of the Second World War.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
